import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Car, MapPin, Phone, Mail, CheckCircle, MessageCircle, Calendar, ChevronDown, Clock, Award, Shield, Star, Users, Map, Briefcase } from 'lucide-react'; const ShafeerPortfolio = () => { const [bookingDetails, setBookingDetails] = useState({ service: '', bookingDate: '', carType: '', pickupLocation: '', dropoffLocation: '', phoneNumber: '', email: '' }); // State to track if the floating button should be visible const [showFloatingButton, setShowFloatingButton] = useState(false); // Add scroll event listener to show/hide the floating button useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { const navHeight = document.querySelector('header')?.offsetHeight || 0; const contactSection = document.getElementById('contact'); const contactTop = contactSection?.offsetTop || Infinity; if (window.scrollY > navHeight && window.scrollY < contactTop - 100) { setShowFloatingButton(true); } else { setShowFloatingButton(false); } }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, []); const cars = [ { name: 'Toyota Previa', image: '/previa.jpg', capacity: '9 Passengers', features: ['Comfortable Seating', 'Air Conditioning', 'Smooth Ride'] }, { name: 'Kia Carnival', image: '/carnival.jpg', capacity: '8 Passengers', features: ['Spacious Interior', 'Premium Comfort', 'Modern Amenities'] } ]; const services = [ { type: 'Full Day Service - 800 AED', icon: , description: 'Luxury chauffeur service for high-profile clients with discretion and premium comfort.', price: '800 AED', duration: 'Full Day' }, { type: 'Half Day Service - 400 AED', icon: , description: 'Reliable transportation for executives and business professionals with punctuality guaranteed.', price: '400 AED', duration: 'Half Day' }, { type: 'Drop-off Service - 150 AED', icon: , description: 'One-way transportation service with professional chauffeur.', price: '150 AED', duration: 'Single Trip' } ]; const experienceItems = [ { title: 'Years of Experience', value: '10+', icon: }, { title: 'Clients Served', value: '5000+', icon: }, { title: 'Kilometers Driven', value: '500,000+', icon: }, { title: 'VIP Clients', value: '250+', icon: } ]; const qualitiesItems = [ { title: 'Safe Driving', description: 'Impeccable safety record throughout my career', icon: }, { title: 'Punctual', description: 'Always on time, every time', icon: }, { title: 'Experienced', description: 'Decade of professional driving expertise', icon: } ]; const handleWhatsAppContact = () => { const phoneNumber = '+971501781981'; // Replace with actual number const message = `Booking Inquiry:\nService: ${bookingDetails.service}\nDate: ${bookingDetails.bookingDate}\nCar: ${bookingDetails.carType}`; const whatsappUrl = `https://wa.me/${phoneNumber}?text=${encodeURIComponent(message)}`; window.open(whatsappUrl, '_blank'); }; const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setBookingDetails(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log('Booking submitted:', bookingDetails); alert('Booking request submitted. I will contact you soon!'); }; return (

My extensive knowledge of roads and routes ensures efficient travel, while my commitment to customer service guarantees a comfortable and pleasant journey.
